edu.illinois.mitra.starl.functions

Class RandomLeaderElection

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.functions.RandomLeaderElection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancellable, LeaderElection, MessageListener

    public class RandomLeaderElection
extends java.lang.Object
implements LeaderElection, MessageListener
    Leader election algorithm which picks a random robot from all of the participants. Calling 'elect' will begin the election process. Periodically calling 'getLeader' is required to advance the election state machine.
